SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."PostStatus", p."Title", p."UserId", u."Id", u."CreatedAt", u."Email", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", i0."Id", i0."Content", i0."IsDeleted", i0."Name", i0."PostId", i0."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserId", l."Id", l."IsLiked", l."PostId", l."UserId"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserId"
    FROM "Comments" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Id", i0."Id", c0."Id"

    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserId"
    FROM "Comments" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Id", i0."Id", c0."Id"

2025-06-26 00:15:23.902 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (40ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."PostStatus", p."Title", p."UserId", u."Id", u."CreatedAt", u."Email", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", i0."Id", i0."Content", i0."IsDeleted", i0."Name", i0."PostId", i0."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserId", l."Id", l."IsLiked", l."PostId", l."UserId"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserId"
    FROM "Comments" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Id", i0."Id", c0."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."PostStatus", p."Title", p."UserId", u."Id", u."CreatedAt", u."Email", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", i0."Id", i0."Content", i0."IsDeleted", i0."Name", i0."PostId", i0."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserId", l."Id", l."IsLiked", l."PostId", l."UserId"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserId"
    FROM "Comments" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Id", i0."Id", c0."Id"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."PostStatus", p."Title", p."UserId", u."Id" AS "Id0", u."CreatedAt", u."Email", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c ON s."Id" = c."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON s."Id" = l."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Id0", i."Id", c."Id"

FROM "Images" AS i
WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."PostStatus", p."Title", p."UserId", u."Id" AS "Id0", u."CreatedAt", u."Email", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c ON s."Id" = c."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON s."Id" = l."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Id0", i."Id", c."Id"

INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"

    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Id", i0."Id", c0."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserId"
    FROM "Comments" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Id", i0."Id", c0."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserId"
    FROM "Comments" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Id", i0."Id", c0."Id"

) AS s

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."PostStatus", p."Title", p."UserId", u."Id", u."CreatedAt", u."Email", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", i0."Id", i0."Content", i0."IsDeleted", i0."Name", i0."PostId", i0."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserId", l."Id", l."IsLiked", l."PostId", l."UserId"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserId"
    FROM "Comments" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Id", i0."Id", c0."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."PostStatus", p."Title", p."UserId", u."Id", u."CreatedAt", u."Email", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", i0."Id", i0."Content", i0."IsDeleted", i0."Name", i0."PostId", i0."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserId", l."Id", l."IsLiked", l."PostId", l."UserId"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserId"
    FROM "Comments" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Id", i0."Id", c0."Id"

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"

    FROM "Comments" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Id", i0."Id", c0."Id"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."PostStatus", p."Title", p."UserId", u."Id" AS "Id0", u."CreatedAt", u."Email", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c ON s."Id" = c."PostId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."PostStatus", p."Title", p."UserId", u."Id", u."CreatedAt", u."Email", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", i0."Id", i0."Content", i0."IsDeleted", i0."Name", i0."PostId", i0."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserId", l."Id", l."IsLiked", l."PostId", l."UserId"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"

    FROM "Comments" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."PostStatus", p."Title", p."UserId", u."Id", u."CreatedAt", u."Email", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", i0."Id", i0."Content", i0."IsDeleted", i0."Name", i0."PostId", i0."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserId", l."Id", l."IsLiked", l."PostId", l."UserId"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt"
    FROM "Images" AS i
    WHERE NOT (i."IsDeleted")
) AS i0 ON p."Id" = i0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserId"
    FROM "Comments" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Likes" AS l ON p."Id" = l."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Id", i0."Id", c0."Id"
